name: search
description: Perform a web search using a search engine (like Google) to find information on the internet. Returns search results with titles, URLs, and snippets.

query.description: Search query terms to find relevant web pages. Use natural language or keywords. Examples: 'Python machine learning tutorial', 'weather forecast New York', 'best restaurants near me'. Use quotes for exact phrases: '"machine learning"'. Use site: for specific sites: 'site:stackoverflow.com python loops'.

num_results.description: Number of search results to return. Typical values: 10 (default), 20, 50. Higher numbers may take longer to process.

search_type.description: Type of search to perform. Options: 'web' (general web search), 'images' (image search), 'news' (recent news articles), 'videos' (video content).
